body:
## Actions
• Add hwloc@2.0.2
• Change default url (from http) to [https://www.open-mpi.org/software/hwloc/v2.0/](https://www.open-mpi.org/software/hwloc/v2.0/)

## Verification build
`$ spack install hwloc`


title: Hwloc add update 2.0.2
